channel.title: Pest Control
channel.description:
Hello, i have all the npc at the pest control place but when i want to attack them and yeah i have already tried a lot of client they give this error
[code]Sprite: compass 0 loaded. Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at client.method34(client.java:1259) at client.method146(client.java:11858) at client.method102(client.java:7629) at client.method9(client.java:8525) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4329) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/code]
what i need to do?

item.title: Pest Control
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

1 post is satisfactory, you have double-posted this topic especially when it hasn’t died. Please in the future only create one topic for one subject.

Thanx.

Read full topic
